statements: SELECT * FROM survey_data WHERE survey_id = 1;
SELECT survey_question, respondent_name, response_date FROM survey_data WHERE response_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT respondent_name FROM survey_data ORDER BY respondent_name ASC;
SELECT survey_id, survey_question, response_text FROM survey_data WHERE survey_id > 5;
SELECT respondent_name, response_text FROM survey_data WHERE response_text LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT survey_id, survey_question, response_text FROM survey_data WHERE response_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY survey_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM survey_data WHERE respondent_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY response_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT respondent_name, COUNT(*) AS total_responses FROM survey_data GROUP BY respondent_name HAVING total_responses > 3 ORDER BY total_responses DESC;
SELECT survey_question, COUNT(*) AS total_responses FROM survey_data WHERE response_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' GROUP BY survey_question ORDER BY total_responses DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT survey_question FROM survey_data WHERE response_text IS NOT NULL ORDER BY survey_question ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM questionnaires;
SELECT questionnaire_text, questionnaire_id FROM questionnaires;
SELECT questionnaire_id, questionnaire_text FROM questionnaires ORDER BY questionnaire_id DESC;
SELECT response_id, response_text, response_date FROM responses WHERE questionnaire_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM responses ORDER BY response_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM questionnaires;
SELECT questionnaire_id, questionnaire_text FROM questionnaires ORDER BY questionnaire_id DESC;
SELECT response_id, questionnaire_id, response_text FROM responses WHERE questionnaire_id = 3;
SELECT response_id, questionnaire_id, response_text, response_date FROM responses WHERE response_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT questionnaire_id, COUNT(*) AS total_responses FROM responses GROUP BY questionnaire_id HAVING total_responses > 1;
SELECT * FROM survey_questionnaires;
SELECT id, question FROM survey_questionnaires ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT response, user_id FROM survey_responses WHERE questionnaire_id = 1;
SELECT id, response_id, is_valid FROM data_validation WHERE is_valid = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(response) AS response_count FROM survey_responses GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM survey_questionnaires WHERE id = 3;
SELECT question FROM survey_questionnaires WHERE LENGTH(question) > 10;
SELECT questionnaire_id, response FROM survey_responses WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY questionnaire_id DESC;
SELECT response_id, is_valid FROM data_validation WHERE is_valid = TRUE;
SELECT id, questionnaire_id, response, user_id FROM survey_responses WHERE user_id IN (2, 4) ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM questionnaires;
SELECT title, description FROM questionnaires ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT id, question, question_type FROM questionnaire_questions WHERE id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT * FROM responses WHERE respondent_id = '98765432-1234-5678-1234-876543219abc' ORDER BY response_time DESC;
SELECT response_id, valid, validation_message FROM data_validation WHERE valid = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM questionnaires;
SELECT id, title FROM questionnaires WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM responses ORDER BY response_time DESC;
SELECT question, question_type FROM questionnaire_questions WHERE questionnaire_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT r.id, r.response, v.valid FROM responses r JOIN data_validation v ON r.id = v.response_id;
SELECT * FROM survey_questionnaires;
SELECT id, questionnaire_title FROM survey_questionnaires ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE responder_name = 'John';
SELECT response_text, response_date FROM survey_responses WHERE questionnaire_id = 1;
SELECT id, rule_name, rule_description FROM data_validation_rules ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM survey_questionnaires;
SELECT id, questionnaire_title, created_at FROM survey_questionnaires WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE responder_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT id, cleaning_rule_name FROM data_cleaning_rules ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_responses FROM survey_responses;
